amendment.description: Amendment requires that veteran-owned small businesses be given the preference for contracts equal to that of any group eligible for a preferred consideration except for service-disabled veteran-owned small businesses which would receive greater consideration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to enter into a contract using procedures that do not give to small business concerns owned and controlled by veterans of the Small Business Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Fitzpatrick.
